verses.verse: Why do the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7283>rage<s%>, And the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> <S%H1897>meditate<s%> a vain <S%H7385>thing<s%>?

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3320>set<s%> <S%H7336>themselves<s%>, And the rulers take <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, Against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and against his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, saying,
Let us <S%H5423>break<s%> their <S%H4147>bonds<s%> <S%H5423>asunder<s%>, And cast <S%H7993>away<s%> their cords from <S%H5688>us<s%>.
He that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H7832>laugh<s%>: The <S%H136>Lord<s%> will have them in <S%H3932>derision<s%>.
Then will he <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them in his <S%H639>wrath<s%>, And <S%H926>vex<s%> them in his sore <S%H2740>displeasure<s%>:
Yet I have <S%H5258>set<s%> my <S%H4428>king<s%> Upon my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
I will <S%H5608>tell<s%> of the <S%H2706>decree<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Thou art my son; This <S%H3117>day<s%> have I begotten <S%H3205>thee<s%>.

Ask <S%H7592><s%> of <S%H5414>me<s%>, and I will give thee the <S%H1471>nations<s%> for thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, And the uttermost <S%H657>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for thy <S%H272>possession<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H7489>break<s%> them with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>; Thou shalt dash them in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> like a <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H3627>vessel<s%>.
Now therefore be <S%H7919>wise<s%>, O ye <S%H4428>kings<s%>: Be <S%H3256>instructed<s%>, ye <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Kiss <S%H5401><s%> the <S%H1248>son<s%>, lest he be <S%H599>angry<s%>, and ye <S%H6>perish<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, For his <S%H639>wrath<s%> will soon <S%H4592>be<s%> <S%H1197>kindled<s%>. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are all they that take refuge in <S%H2620>him<s%>.
